name: WW2 - Sad Prank
description:
Erkan Yaprak | Leaf Game | 2022

It is a game made by Erkan Yaprak

Gameplay : 

This game is a clone of the game Nerf Epic Prank made by Nerf. But of course, Leaf Game has become an even better game with its quality.

You can download the game and shoot a video with the hashtag #leafGame on your social media accounts.

Good Games ;)
